description: Detects shell spawned from Java host process, which could be a sign of exploitation (e.g. log4j exploitation)
name: Shells Spawned by Java
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:*\\java.exe AND process.executable.text:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:*build* AND process.command_line.text:*build*)))
author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades)
Nasreddine Bencherchali
